text: Va agar Alloh taolo mardumro ʙa saʙaʙi on ci kardaand, mucozot mekard, hec cunʙandaero ʙar pusti zamin ʙoqi nameguzost, ammo [muhlat medihad va kajfari] ononro to saromadi muajjane ʙa ta'xir meandozad; pas, hangome ki acalason [dar qijomat] faro rasad, jaqinan, Alloh taolo ʙa holi ʙandagonas ʙinost
